item.title: What is said to a person whose actions are disagreeable
item.summary: What is said to people whose actions are disagreeable (or 'not nice'). The person is cursed and others are angry with him. The people question his treatment of them.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book V-24
item.author: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)

keyword.subkw: what is said when actions are disagreeable or 'not nice'
what is said to a person whose actions are disagreeable
